name: Stown X Phetus "Creatures" SnapBack
description:
We have teamed up with renowned New York Graffiti/Street artist Phetus for our first ever collaboration hat. It's the first of an "artist series" we plan on continuing with talented artists in the future. 

Our company has taken on a life of its own. This cap illustrates it with Stown letters being transformed into creatures. Phetus's logo (Phat Phace) is tastefully embroidered on the right side of the cap, and the Stown rear lettering has been cartoonified using wild eyes and expressions.  The underbrim features Stown & Phetus embroidery as a signature with the Phat Phace logo in the middle. The body of the hat is navy with a black brim, and a hot pink underbrim & snap.

Available in limited quantities / One Size Fits All. This snapback simply will not last. Don't sleep

name: Pencil Pusher T - Black
description: This T Shirt is available in two colors, off white and black. Featuring our signature character.  We printed a limited run of 100, (50 of each) Get one while you still can... Available NOW, Be Stown-thentic!

name: Pencil Pusher T - Natural
description: This T Shirt is available in two colors, off white and black. Featuring our signature character.  We printed a limited run of 100, (50 of each) Get one while you still can... Available NOW, Be Stown-thentic!

name: Grassroots X Stown LTD. "Stownroots" Hemp Fitted Hat [Black]
description:
The Stown LTD. Grassroots fitted is finally in! I designed this hat after the Big Up music festival and we have been waiting with anticipation to drop these hats since then. Stown is proud to present our first collaborative hat With Grassroots California.

This hat features our signature Medusa Stown face repeating 3 times, in a Rasta colorway.  The repeating face is influenced by Alex grey's repeating Buddha faces. My favorite part about the hat is the back almost gives a crown like effect when worn backwards. 

These hats are available in limited quantities, so be sure to grab yours today!!

name: Grassroots X Stown LTD. "Stownroots" Hemp Fitted Hat [Natural]
description:
The Stown LTD. Grassroots fitted is finally in! This version features Natural Hemp as the base material of the hat. We designed this hat after the 2011 Big Up music festival and have been waiting with anticipation to drop these since then. Stown is proud to present our first collaborative hat With Grassroots California.

This hat features our signature Medusa Stown face repeating 3 times, in a Rasta colorway.  The repeating face is influenced by Alex grey's repeating Buddha faces. My favorite part about the hat is the back almost gives a crown like effect when worn backwards. 

These hats are available in limited quantities, so be sure to grab yours today!!
